review: I have only used this for Netflix and Youtube but it's great.  Even with a 1Mbps connection, the Chromecast is connected to my Kindlefire HD and it streams perfectly.  It's very easy to set up my 11 year old daughter and my 8 year old son set theirs up no problem.  In a world of expensive devices that let you down this is an inexpensive device that goes beyond what I expected.  With more features in the works it can only get better.

review: While I'm eagerly waiting for 3rd parties to expand Chromecast's functionality, the Netflix integration alone has made it worth it.  The device couldn't be simpler to use.  Well worth the money for Netflix alone, and with the recent addition of Hulu and more to follow it will only get better.
